de.saschafeldmann.adesso.master.thesis.generation

Interface LinguisticRealiser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinguisticRealiserImpl

    public interface LinguisticRealiser
    Project: Masterthesis of Sascha Feldmann Creation date: 04.07.2016 Author: Sascha Feldmann (sascha.feldmann@gmx.de)

    University: Hochschule f√ºr Technik und Wirtschaft, Berlin Fachbereich 4 Studiengang Internationale Medieninformatik (Master)

    Company: adesso AG

    Interface for the linguistic realiser which finally triggers the natural language generation task to produce a well-formed question on either English or German (depending on the LearningContent).
    See: Reiter, E., Dale, R., & Feng, Z. (2000). Building natural language generation systems (Vol. 33). Cambridge: Cambridge university press.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TestQuestion generateQuestion(Concept concept)
      Generate the question upon the given concept.

    • Method Detail

      • generateQuestion

        TestQuestion generateQuestion(Concept concept)
        Generate the question upon the given concept.
        Parameters:
        concept - the concept
        Returns:
        the generated question
        Throws:
        QuestionGenerationException - on exceptions during question generation
